title: German court finds main suspect guilty of crimes against humanity in landmark Syria torture trial
content:
1. German court finds main suspect guilty of crimes against humanity in landmark Syria torture trial  NBC News
  2. Syrian colonel guilty of murder, rape and torture in 'Hell on Earth' jail - BBC News  BBC News
  3. First Trial for Syrian State Atrocities Yields Guilty Verdict in Germany  The New York Times
  4. A Syrian colonel is jailed for life in a first torture trial for the Assad regime. It's one step in a 'long path to justice,' say victims' families  CNN
  5. Assad regime officer sentenced to life in prison for Syria war crimes  Axios
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ドイツの裁判所、画期的なシリア拷問裁判で主犯格を人道に対する罪で有罪に
